description: Plywood is layers of softwood veneer bonded together with a phenolic resin with an interior grade finish.
short desc: Plywood is layers of softwood glued together with a phenolic resin
source: Samples cut from 1.59 cm thick, 122 cm x 244 cm sheet.

measured property.test description:
Initial-mass-normalized mass loss rate [1/s] was measured in the simultaneous thermal analyzer experiments at three heating rates: 3 K/min, 10 K/min, and 30 K/min.

Cone calorimeter tests were conducted at a heat flux of 35 kW/m2 on samples conditioned at 20°C and 50% relative humidity.

measured property.test name: heat release rate per unit area
measured property.test description: Cone calorimeter tests were conducted at a heat flux of 35 kW/m<sup>2</sup> on samples conditioned at 20°C and 50% relative humidity.
Cone calorimeter tests were conducted at a heat flux of 35 kW/m<sup>2</sup> on samples conditioned at 20°C and 50% relative humidity.
Micro-scale combustion calorimeter tests were conducted at a heating rate of 30 K/min.

derived property.test description:
Micro-scale combustion calorimeter tests were conducted at a heating rate of 30 K/min.

Cone calorimeter tests were conducted at a heat flux of 35 kW/m2 on samples conditioned at 20°C and 50% relative humidity.
